Title: Establishes a Center for Transplantation and Immunology Research at the University at Buffalo and Erie County Medical Center; appropriation
Summary: Establishes a Center for Transplantation and Immunology Research at the University at Buffalo and Erie County Medical Center; provides the mission of the Center for Transportation and Immunology Research is to advance the longevity of kidney organ transplants through improved knowledge of immunology, pathology and therapeutics; grants authorization to apply for grants; makes an appropriation of $227,333.34 each year for three years.
ActClause: AN ACT to establish a Center for Transplantation and Immunology Research at the University at Buffalo and Erie County Medical Center; and making an appropriation therefor
